#summary &ubreve; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &ubreve;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ubreve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/016c/index.htm U+0016C].
  * `&ubreve;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/016d/index.htm U+0016D].
